availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Cleland Maxwell (Marion County, Kentucky, physician and slaveholder.)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, physician. Marion County, Kentucky, native. Son of Joseph Maxwell and Eunice Kitchell Stiles Maxwell. Married to Emily Howell Maxwell. Father of Emma Maxwell Howard. Married to Ellen P. Doneghy Maxwell. Graduate of Miami University in Oxford, Butler County, Ohio, in 1841. Physician in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Marion County in 1850. Physician in Marion County in 1860. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Marion County in 1860. Served as examining surgeon for the Fourth District of Kentucky on April 23, 1864 to 1865.
